mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMONCODE B ON (A.CMNT_CODE = B.CODE_ID)

SELECT CMNT_NO, B.CODE_NAME AS CMNT_CODE, CMNT_NAME, CMNT_SIZE, CMNT_CAPA, CMNT_LIMIT, SUBSTR(CMNT_OPEN,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(CMNT_OPEN,3,4) AS CMNT_OPEN, SUBSTR(CMNT_CLOSE,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(CMNT_CLOSE,3,4) AS CMNT_CLOSE, CMNT_DESC, APT_CODE FROM COMMUNITY A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMONCODE B ON (A.CMNT_CODE = B.CODE_ID) WHERE APT_CODE = #{aptCode } AND CMNT_NO = #{cmntNo }
